meanings.definition: Excessive movement disorders characterized by involuntary, abnormal, and excessive movements.
meanings.sent1: The patient's hyperkinesias made it difficult for them to sit still during the appointment.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the patient with hyperkinesias after observing their constant fidgeting and jerky movements.
meanings.sent3: During the dance competition, the hyperkinesias of the performer added an unexpected twist to their routine.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperkinesias on the soccer field were like a whirlwind of energy, impossible to contain.
meanings.sent5: The hyperkinesias of the character in the movie were so exaggerated, it became a defining trait.

meanings.definition: A condition marked by uncontrollable muscle movements.
meanings.sent1: The hyperkinesias in his arms caused them to flail uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: The neurologist identified the hyperkinesias as the reason behind the patient's twitching muscles.
meanings.sent3: The hyperkinesias in her legs during the race made her look like a puppet on strings.
meanings.sent4: His hyperkinesias were like a secret dance party happening in his body.
meanings.sent5: The hyperkinesias of the robot were so realistic, it was almost eerie to watch.
